name: Refinery Row
description:
Can you beat the big timers that had a head start on you. can you over take your dad and elder brother and try to reach even greater heights and become the best oil Tycoon out there?

A simple point and click build stuff and watch your money for up and up so you can buy more stuff. but be careful random fires and explosions can cripple your game if you don't leave extra money aside for a rainy day.

Made this in a week for the games plus jam 2021 the theme was  "You're The Best"

Hope you enjoy and please feel free to give feedback so i can improve on the game in the future 

Things i wish I was able to get done 

-a image that followed the mouse pointer so you knew if you were still building a building or not

- buying up more land so you can get even bigger.
